title: Bad Echo multi-channel signed distance field font JSON schema
description: Defines the parameters for generating an atlas for font that uses multi-channel signed distance fields.

fontPath.description: The path to the font file (.ttf/.otf) to create an atlas for.

characterSet.description: The character set that will be included in the font atlas.

start.description: The decimal value for the first character in a range of characters to include in the character set.

end.description: The decimal value for the last character in a range of characters to include in the character set.

resolution.description: The size of the glyphs in the atlas, in pixels per em.

range.description: The distance field range in output pixels, which affects how far the distance field extends beyond the glyphs.
